title: My Playstyle?
body:
So I've been a Filler for most games. But I'd like to be able to settle into a role or two. As far as my playstyle goes? I don't know... My friends have told me that I'm a "safe" player (as I am usually a sniper in most games), but in my opinion im more of an "Aggro Sniper" (as in, I like to come out of nowhere, deal massive amounts of damage, and run away and dissapear). I've noticed I'm very bad at initiating teamfights so I don't want to be a tank or any kind of initiator...

Suggestions anyone?

replies.body:
You should try to play mid or jungle and pick assassins if your playstyle is to do burst damage up close and get out.
If you like doing a lot of damage from a distance, then I suggest mid or adc role, and pick someone with a lot of range. For ADCs, Varus, Caitlyn, and Kog'Maw come to mind. For mid lane pick, I suggest Xerath, Azir, and maybe Lux?


Either way, I think mid lane is your best pick.
I do like assassins but theyre mostly jump in, burst damage, then kinda try to get away somehow. At least that how I feel haha
But isn't that what you said you liked?
Yes XD But im looking for someone that has an easier escape as well! Assassins are probably definitely the closest thing to what im looking for though

Katarina gets a reset on her blink (as well as every other spells), and Kha'Zix gets a reset on his jump (when evolved) upon kills/assists. I think a lot of other assassins have reliable escapes, but these two come to mind.
Oh I didnt know that about Kha! I did like Kat while she was free... Merhaps I'll get her :D
This would be an easier question to answer if you just named like 5 champions you love to play.
I dont really love any champion though so far though which is my problem haha
well whos @ the top of your champion mastery? Thats usually a decent (not perfect) indicator.
Karma! Because I do good as her, not really because I like her all too much lol

Yeah see that what I thought! Until I played a couple games and got squished while being oom 90% of the time
Sounds like you're a pick player. Most likely mid, also supports like thresh, morgana.

Well due to the wanting to keep range I would suggest either a Mage or an ADC. However your playstyle as you put it was to come in, deal damage and leave with the possibility of getting a kill here or there. Have you tried jungling? Now there is a catch, if you decide to jungle you will have to work with your team to gank enemies and this could be a little heavier on the aggro than you might like but even if you don't grab a kill a jungler can help a lane by simply forcing the enemy lane champion to B thus giving your lane some free farm. 

Why don't we start with, do you have any preferred champions? Anyone you especially like to play?

I have been putting some thought into jungling because that does seem like something that fits me but i haven't tried yet.. 
Someone I do want to play very much is Ahri. ult in, throw combo, ult out. As for someone I like to play, Karma I would say I'm best as, yet she's not really as fun as I'd like... 
As for ADC I've played a few games as adc, all of which have ended horridly so I dont believe that one is for me haha
